package.name: DockX
package.shortDescription: Pasteboard shortcuts on your keyboard dock!

descriptionlist.description:
This package depends libsparkcolourpicker package from SparkDev: https://sparkdev.me/

Add pasteboard shortcuts to your keyboard dock!

Supporting notched devices (X, XS, XR, 11) running iOS 12-14. Mostly works with iPhone X UI enabling tweak. Compatible with Barmoji. If you own an iPad, check out XPad.

Available shortcuts:
•Select
•Select All
•Select Line
•Select Paragraph
•Select Sentence
•Copy
•Paste
•Cut
•Undo
•Redo
•Beginning of Document
•Ending of Document
•Capitalize
•Lowercase
•Uppercase
•Delete
•Bold
•Italic
•Underline
•Cursor Left
•Cursor Right
•Cursor Up
•Cursor Down
•Dismiss Keyboard
•Auto-Correction
•Auto-Capitalization
•Keyboard Input Type (NumPad, PhonePad etc)
•Define Word
•Shell Command
•Insert Text
•Previous Word
•Next Word
•Line Start
•Line End
•Start of Paragraph
•End of Paragraph
•Start of Sentence
•End of Sentence
•Globe
•Dictation
•Studly Caps (SpOnGebOb tExT)

Third-party tweak shortcuts:
•CopyLog*
•Translomatic*
•Wasabi*
•Pasithea*
•Copypasta*
•Loupe*
•Tranzlo*

Available gestures:
•Single tap
•Long Press
•Double Tap
•"Shooting Star"

and many more default long press gesture for each shortcut

Go to setting page to manage your shortcuts.
If you wish to contribute in localizing your local language, submit pull request at https://github.com/udevsharold/DockX-Localization

To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs

*Package needs to be installed for shortcut to show.

changelog.change:
NEW FEATURES:
•Added Tranzlo shortcut
•Added options for Spongebob text shortcuts (random, alternate, vowels, or consonents)

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Improved entropy of randomness for Spongebob text
•Reorganized some settings
•Code refactoring

If you experiencing any issue or shortcuts not showing correctly, please reset.
